module: Module-level comment: The `hdb3_code` module encodes binary data into HDB3 format. It utilizes three interconnected submodules (`hdb3_plug_v`, `hdb3_plug_b`, `hdb3_d2t`) for stepwise processing of data. Input signals `i_rst_n`, `i_clk`, and `i_data` control operations, with internal wires `w_plug_v` and `w_plug_b` facilitating data flow between stages, culminating in the HDB3 encoded output `o_hdb3_code`.
